Coopers Creek: The remote Southland village that will eventually disappear https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/coopers-creek-the-remote-southland-village-that-will-eventually-disappear/QNQT5JNPU5D4ZKZSGGUUDG7TF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/coopers-creek-the-remote-southland-village-that-will-eventually-disappear/QNQT5JNPU5D4ZKZSGGUUDG7TF4/ Matthew RosenbergThose who call the place home do so under an annual licence agreement with the council. Wed, 25 Sep 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Coopers Creek is home to some unique structures, including this miniature stone house. Photo / LDR / Matthew Rosenberg
Capital gains tax: Christopher Luxon takes crack at ANZ boss Antonia Watson over CGT support https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/capital-gains-tax-christopher-luxon-takes-crack-at-anz-boss-antonia-watson-over-cgt-support/E5YJ3L2YSFE6DKJRXZCSCPVPVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/capital-gains-tax-christopher-luxon-takes-crack-at-anz-boss-antonia-watson-over-cgt-support/E5YJ3L2YSFE6DKJRXZCSCPVPVQ/ Antonia Watson said she believed taxing investment properties at point of sale was fair. Thames at centre of counterfeit cash investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/thames-at-centre-of-counterfeit-cash-investigation/KSC4BMVVPVCI5GYC5ENMFH7PFA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/thames-at-centre-of-counterfeit-cash-investigation/KSC4BMVVPVCI5GYC5ENMFH7PFA/ Al WilliamsNumerous fakes notes presented in Thames and wider Waikato area. Wed, 25 Sep 2024 05:03:00 +0000 Police reported 15 incidents of forged $20, $50 and $100 notes presented at various local businesses and larger retail stores across the Coromandel Peninsula and Matamata-Piako area over the past two months. Photo / 123rf
Coroner sets December review for Pauline Hanna’s death after Polkinghorne acquittal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-sets-december-review-for-pauline-hannas-death-after-polkinghorne-acquittal/UY6XYQ6LGBGY3MKHCSFBNTO6II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-sets-december-review-for-pauline-hannas-death-after-polkinghorne-acquittal/UY6XYQ6LGBGY3MKHCSFBNTO6II/ Benjamin PlummerThe review will be held in December 2024 to determine next steps in the coronial inquiry. Wed, 25 Sep 2024 04:14:59 +0000 A review hearing into the death of Pauline Hanna has been set down for December as advised by the Coroner just days after Philip Polkinghorne was acquitted for the murder and manslaughter of his wife. Photo / Michael Craig
